de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.query
Class QueryImpl

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.query.QueryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IQuery
Direct Known Subclasses:
TMQLQuery, TMQLQuery
public abstract class QueryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IQuery

Abstract base implementation of IQuery to implements the core functionality of each query.

Author:
Sven Krosse

getResults

public IResultSet<?> getResults()
                         throws TMQLRuntimeException
Returns the querying result stored by the TMQL4J runtime after finishing the querying process. If the querying process is not finished yet, an exception will be thrown

Specified by:
getResults in interface IQuery
Returns:
the querying results and never null
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if querying process not finished yet

allowExpression

public void allowExpression(java.lang.Class<? extends IExpression> allowedExpressionType)
Allow the expression as part of the parsed tree. Please note, that this has only an effect if the expression was forbid before.

Specified by:
allowExpression in interface IQuery
Parameters:
allowedExpressionType - the expression to allow

allowModificationQueries

public void allowModificationQueries()
Allow any expression which modify the topic map. Please note, that this has only an effect if the expressions were forbid before.

Specified by:
allowModificationQueries in interface IQuery
